channel.title: [PI] mage short bow, bug hits twice
channel.description:
mage short bow hits twice in the wildy?? after doing spec how do i fix this?
thats what i have in itemAssitant.java - [code]case 859: // magic bows case 861: case 11235: case 15015: case 15016: c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 7549); specialAmount(weapon, c.specAmount, 7561); break; [/code]
